name: JOY You-I-He蘭花園 第一集
detailed_description:
JOY You-I-He兰花园，A text avg game.
We image style isn't japan or american style, Make a new image style.

Story narrative fairies keep find fairy king to be born in where, And reincarnation become human of fairy king unknown self true identity, Live with friends to operating flower shop life at everyday.

At game, Haven't over complicated game content, Let you can easy read story.
At game, Unlimited pass level, So you can read any story.

English language already in our project, coming soon.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7, Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT720 or up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
